subject: TODAY YOUR $2.500, 000.00 IS G
body:
TODAY YOUR $2.500, 000.00 IS GONE FINALLY.
I have to inform you again, that we are not playing over this, I know
my reason for the continuous sending of this notification to you, the
fact is that you can't seem to trust any one again over this payment
and we have now curt the prize of $50 to $25 APPLE GIFT CARD for what
you have been in cantered in many months ago, but I want you to trust
me,
I cannot scam you for $25 APPLE GIFT CARD it is for bank processing of
your payment, the fees is $50 but we have curt to $25 APPLE GIFT CARD
so that you can be able to send it today, $25 is clearly written to
you before, and the good part of this, is that you will never, ever be
disturbed again over any kind of payment, this is final, and the forms
from there becomes effective once we submit your payment application
processing fee and pay the form fee of $90 I don't want you to loose
this fund this time, because you may never get another such good
opportunity, the federal government is keen and very determined to pay
your overdue debts, this is not a fluke, I would not
want you to loose this fund out of ignorance,
I will send you all the documents as soon as bank payment processing
fee is paid, you have to trust me, you will get your fund, 
find a way
to get $25 APPLE GIFT CARD
 you will not loose it,instead it will bring
your financial breakthrough, find the money and send it to our
bursary.
The reason why am sending you this because I want you to receive your
USD2.5M immediately we are trying to round up for this payment
program.The processing charges which was initially on the high price
has been cut down by the payout bank considering the poor economic
situations that make it difficult for the middle class citizens to
meet up with the processing charges of their entitlement. Upon the
confirmation of your processing charges you will get your $2.500,
000.00 into your account within 15 hrs.
Best Regards
TRACY VORMAN

subject: Re: TODAY YOUR $2.500, 000.00 IS G
body:
Hello Tracy Vorman,

Thank you for your message. I must say, it's quite intriguing! It seems like there's a lot going on here. 

I'm curious about this APPLE GIFT CARD you mentioned. How exactly does that work in relation to the bank processing of my payment? 

Also, could you please elaborate more on the documents you mentioned? What kind of documents are these and what is their purpose?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sherry
